segments.text: Excuse me , Mr . Emory ? Mr . Macmillan , would like to know if you have the completed schedule for next week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do , Susan . Just a moment . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Sorry to trouble you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all , Susan . Just tell him to leave it with my secretary when he â€™ s finished with it
segments.speaker: S2
